name: Resizable
description: Provides a callback for when the element resizes. Differs from the StrandTraits.SizeResponsible because measurements are tracked via requestAnimationFrame.

attributes.name: resizeTarget
attributes.description: Sets the target element which will respond on resize.

methods.name: elementResize
methods.description: Abstract method, called on element resize.

arguements.name: w
arguements.description: The new offsetWidth of the target element, if it has changed. Otherwise returns null.

arguements.name: h
arguements.description: The new offsetHeight of the target element. Otherwise returns null.
